mama gothrayakata ekkeneku bagin oba samagen minisun dolosdeneku gathimi. 24 owhu pitathwi kandata nagi eshkol mitiyawatha dakwa gos eeka sodisikaloya. 25 owhu deshaye palawalin swalpayak thamunge athwala ragena apa langata basa awuth: ape dewiwu swaminwahanse apata dena deshaya hondaya kiya apata danwuha. 26 esewinumuth oba sama yanta nokamathiwa oba samage dewiwu swaminwahansege aagnyawata wiruddhawa karaligasa, 27 oba samage kudaramwala sita konduramin: swaminwahanse apata wairawu bawin apa winashakarana pinisa amoriwarun athata apa pawa dimata misara deshayen apa genaseka. 28 api kothanata nagi yamuda?
